verses.verse: Now on <S%G1161>the<s%> <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G4404>early,<s%> while it <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G4653>dark,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> taken <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> she <S%G5143>ran<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5368>loved,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "They have taken <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> we <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> they have <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G846>him!<s%>"

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>

<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G1417>both<s%> <S%G5143>ran<s%> <S%G3674>together.<s%> <S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G4390%G99999>outran<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G4413>first.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3879>Stooping<s%> and looking <S%G991>in,<s%> he saw the linen <S%G3608>cloths<s%> <S%G2749>lying,<s%> <S%G3305>yet<s%> <S%G1525>he<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> enter <S%G1525>in.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G190>following<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2334>saw<s%> the linen <S%G3608>cloths<s%> <S%G2749>lying,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4676>cloth<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2749>lying<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the linen <S%G3608>cloths,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> rolled <S%G1794>up<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G1520>a<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> by <S%G5565>itself.<s%>

<S%G2532>So<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G3767>the<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> also entered <S%G1525>in,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4100>believed.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> as <S%G3764>yet<s%> they <S%G3764>didn't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>
<S%G3767>So<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> went <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> their own <S%G1438>homes.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> was <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G2799>weeping.<s%> <S%G3767>So,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> she <S%G2799>wept,<s%> she <S%G3879>stooped<s%> and looked <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2516>sitting,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G2776>head,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2749>lain.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1565>They<s%> <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> are <S%G2799>you<s%> <S%G3004>weeping?<s%>" She said to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3754>"Because<s%> they have taken <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> they have <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> When she <S%G2036>had<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5023>this,<s%> she <S%G4762>turned<s%> <S%G1519>around<s%> <S%G3694><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>standing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> are <S%G2799>you<s%> <S%G5101>weeping?<s%> Who are <S%G2212>you<s%> looking <S%G1565>for?<s%>" She, <S%G1380>supposing<s%> <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> to <S%G2076>be<s%> the <S%G2780>gardener,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>"Sir,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> have <S%G941>carried<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G941>away,<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> you have <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G2504>I<s%> will <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G142>away.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G3137>"Mary.<s%>" She <S%G1565>turned<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4462>"Rabboni!<s%>" <S%G3739>which<s%> is to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher!<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> <S%G680>hold<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G305>haven't<s%> <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G305>ascended<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G305><s%> 'I am ascending <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>to<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>'"

<S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> she had <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that he had <S%G2036>said<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> to <S%G846>her.<s%>

<S%G3767>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> it was <S%G3798>evening,<s%> on that <S%G2250>day,<s%> the <S%G1520>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> and <S%G2532>when<s%> the <S%G2374>doors<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> locked <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4863>assembled,<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1515>"Peace<s%> be to <S%G5213>you.<s%>"

When he <S%G5124>had<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> he <S%G1166>showed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4125>side.<s%> The <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5463>were<s%> <S%G5463>glad<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G1515>"Peace<s%> be to <S%G5213>you.<s%> <S%G2531>As<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> even <S%G2504>so<s%> <S%G3992>I<s%> send <S%G5209>you.<s%>"

<S%G2532>When<s%> he had <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> he breathed <S%G1720>on<s%> <S%G2532>them,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2983>"Receive<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit!<s%>

If you <S%G863%G99999>forgive<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%>'s <S%G266>sins,<s%> they have been <S%G863>forgiven<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%> If you <S%G2902%G99999>retain<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%>'s <S%G2902>sins,<s%> they have been retained."

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus,<s%> <S%G2258>wasn't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came.<s%>

The <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "We have <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord!<s%>" <S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1437>"Unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> the <S%G5179>print<s%> of the <S%G2247>nails,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4125>side,<s%> I <S%G4100>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G4100>believe.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G3638>eight<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2080>inside,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas<s%> was <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> the <S%G2374>doors<s%> being <S%G2808>locked,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1515>"Peace<s%> be to <S%G5213>you.<s%>"

<S%G1534>Then<s%> <S%G3004>he<s%> said to <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> <S%G5342>"Reach<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1147>finger,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5495>hands.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> Reach <S%G5342>here<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> it <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4125>side.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G571>unbelieving,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4103>believing.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2381><s%> <S%G3754>"Because<s%> you have <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> you have <S%G4100>believed.<s%> <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> are those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1492>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1492>seen,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G4100>believed.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G2424%G99999>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> in the presence <S%G1799>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G975>book;<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> are <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4100>believing<s%> you may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name.<s%>
